summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records the official inmate population count and lists several inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody at the time. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of the facility's population shortly before Epstein's death.

events.title: Daily Prison Count
events.description: Official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 758 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was inmate #76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on August 10, 2019.
The official prison count on August 10, 2019, recorded a total inmate population of 758 at MCC New York.
The document includes an inmate roster showing several other inmates with assignment categories related to suicide watch or hospitalization.
This administrative document places Epstein in federal custody approximately one month before his death on August 10, 2019.
